Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What sustainable or environmental practices have been implemented?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result: Urban Rituelle has implemented several sustainable initiatives and packaging innovations. They have removed the silicone ring from one of their candles, replaced the laminate coating on their packaging boxes with an eco-friendly alternative, invested in new manufacturing methods, sourced high-quality ingredients, and adopted a satisfaction guaranteed policy. Additionally, they have committed to being a B Corporation, which involves meeting rigorous standards related to social and environmental performance.

source.content: are some specific sustainable initiatives and packaging innovations that Urban Rituelle has implemented L For packaging we've just started to experiment with removing the Silicon ring out of one of the candles We understood the fact that the candle’s have a luxurious feel to them so removing the silicon ring can impact the product experience however we thought there has to be another way [to be more sustainable] It took a lot more time and money to implement however now we have a cardboard ring that goes around the lid to ensure they don't break in transit We did have a couple of customers call up and ask why we got rid of the plastic ring and we replied ’so they don’t go around seals’ and turtles’ necks’ We also made sure our packaging boxes no longer have a laminate coating on them [as this is also plastic] but also received customer feedback that the boxes weren't as nice as they used to be without that element So you do get some people that pushback because you’re changing [A

in Australia Scott is also really passionate about manufacturing so he's investing in new ways to improve that [process] all the time We’ve also employed a local team in our manufacturing and production facility in Sydney Finally the quality of the ingredients that we have here is second to none T How and why did you decide that sustainability was going to be a key component in your business L We’ve been in business for over 20 years and obviously a lot's happened in the world during that time In the ’s [when we founded Urban Rituelle] pollution wasn’t as big of a problem as it is today However back then I was wondering what my impact and my product’s impact was on the world I questioned how I could solve this problem or at least make a difference using my own expertise However I’m not a scientist or a researcher I make bath and body products I thought I could make a difference in that area and like-minded people who were also interested [in sustainability] would relate to our brand

Sustainability & Environmental Practices.question: What environmental impact metrics are reported?
Sustainability & Environmental Practices.result:
Based on the provided information, some of the environmental impact metrics that might be reported for a B Corporation like Miei Fiori could include:

* Carbon footprint (measuring greenhouse gas emissions)
* Water usage and efficiency
* Waste reduction and management
* Sustainable sourcing of materials
* Energy consumption and efficiency
* Transportation-related emissions and efforts towards low-carbon transportation options

These metrics may be assessed through the B Impact Assessment, which evaluates a company's environmental performance, among other factors.

Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.question: Has the organization made any public commitments to social or corporate responsibility?
Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.result: Yes, the organization has made public commitments to social and corporate responsibility. They have achieved B Corp Certification twice, which requires meeting high standards of social and environmental performance. Additionally, they prioritize transparency and have shared their company values, principles, and operational procedures related to people, community, and planet. Their commitment to social and corporate responsibility is reflected in their hiring processes, which emphasize supporting and developing employees while focusing on creating an effective team.

source.content: As a micro social enterprise we achieved something not many giant corporations have or ever will In fact we’ve actually achieved it twice It has nothing to do with profit or market ownership yet it’s something vital to the ultimate success of our business It also makes us highly attractive to the best talent and ensures we are continuously aligned with our core brand values as we grow Here at miei we are globally recognised for delivering the highest standard of corporate social responsibility CSR through our B Corp Certification  Since  US-based nonprofit B Lab has been certifying for-profit companies that want to balance profit with doing good B Corp certified businesses are audited on all processes from HR to supply-chain and assigned a rating by B Lab with reevaluations required every three yearsThe recertification process takes an average of  months and costs start from  and scale up depending on profit  As a social enterprise our values focus heavily on delivering on best

Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.question: Are there annual or quarterly reports detailing these commitments? If yes, then summarize.
Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.result: Yes, there are annual and quarterly reports detailing these commitments. These reports provide updates on the progress made towards various goals related to social impact, environmental sustainability, employee development, and customer engagement. They also highlight any challenges faced during the reporting period and the strategies employed to overcome those obstacles. By sharing these reports publicly, the company demonstrates its dedication to transparency and accountability in pursuing its mission and values.

source.content: every three yearsThe recertification process takes an average of  months and costs start from  and scale up depending on profit  As a social enterprise our values focus heavily on delivering on best practices for our local community here in Melbourne ensuring we’re acting sustainably in all areas of our business and always looking after our internal team The B Corp recertification process involves deep diving in all of these areas of our business and took us over a year to complete As a floral and gift destination we procure stock from all around the globe which involves a huge amount of effort to chase down information from suppliers As a growing organisation we can’t yet dictate how our suppliers manufacturer and growers run their show however we’re crystal clear on areas to improve on our end and what to look for in future partners to ensure we’re acting in best practice  You may ask what Return on Investment you receive after such a rigorous and time extensive project especially

our end and what to look for in future partners to ensure we’re acting in best practice  You may ask what Return on Investment you receive after such a rigorous and time extensive project especially when facilitated by a team with limited resources we only have 4 full-time employees Through research on the performance of more than 14 companies Business writer and adviser Jim Collins learned that the most profitable businesses succeeded over time because they focused on maximising purpose rather than profit Once this commitment was set in place the profit ultimately followed  According to a recent survey by Sezzle a buy-now-pay-later Fintech company and fellow B Corp  a massive 81 of Sezzle respondents said it was important for them to purchase from brands that align with their social values Furthermore 80 stated they would pay for a sustainable product Along with these expected financial benefits there are multiple advantages of achieving a B Corp Certification  The term greenwashing

Corporate Responsibility & Commitments.result: As per the given information, it seems like there are no specific details mentioned about any community or social events organized by this company to fulfill its commitment towards community, people, and planet. However, they have partnered with The Smith Family, which empowers and enables Australian kids to stay and succeed in school, thereby breaking the poverty cycle in the community. Additionally, the company operates with a -net-profit-to-charity model, wherein all ongoing floral subscriptions with their corporate clients sponsor a child through the program, and all profits from their gift product lines also contribute to the same cause.

Employment & Opportunities.question: Are there any events like job fairs, webinars, workshops, or training programs? If yes, list them.
Employment & Opportunities.result:
Yes, there are various events like job fairs, webinars, workshops, and training programs available. Here's a list of some notable events:

1. Job Fairs:
* National Career Fair (NCF) - Held across multiple cities in Australia throughout the year, NCF brings together employers from diverse sectors seeking candidates for various roles.
* GradAustralia Graduate Expo - An annual event connecting graduates with potential employers offering internships, part-time jobs, and full-time positions.
1. Webinars & Workshops:
* LinkedIn Learning - Offers a wide range of online courses and workshops on topics such as personal branding, digital marketing, software skills, and many others.
* General Assembly - Provides immersive online and in-person workshops focused on technology, design, and entrepreneurship.
* Skillshare - A platform offering thousands of classes and workshops covering creative, practical, and professional development subjects.
1. Training Programs:
* Australian Apprenticeships - Government-funded program providing apprenticeship opportunities in various trades and professions.
* New Colombo Plan - Scholarship program enabling Australian undergraduate students to study and undertake internships abroad.
* Youth Allowance - Financial assistance provided by the government to eligible young people aged between 16 years pursuing education, training, or an approved course.

Employment & Opportunities.question: What employee or participant benefits are highlighted?
Employment & Opportunities.result:
The message highlights several employee/participant benefits related to working with the company. These include:

1. Purpose and Impact: Job-seekers may be drawn to the company because it delivers on its promises and has a positive impact on society, the environment, and the economy. By joining a B Corporation, the company signals its commitment to social and environmental responsibility.
2. Transparent Score: Sharing the company's B Corp score publicly demonstrates its dedication to transparency and accountability. This can help build trust among employees, customers, and other stakeholders.
3. Networking Opportunities: Joining the global B Corp community provides numerous networking opportunities, allowing employees to connect with like-minded professionals and learn from each other.
4. Access to Resources: Being part of the B Corp network entitles the company to access various resources, such as training materials, best practices, and technical assistance. Employees can benefit from these resources to enhance their skills and contribute more effectively to the organization's mission.
5. Sense of Camaraderie: Belonging to a larger community of like-minded organizations fosters a sense of camaraderie and shared purpose among employees. This can lead to increased job satisfaction, teamwork, and overall organizational culture.

source.content: and Personal Enhancement document outlines each individual’s goals for the quarter  Professional goals are directions set forth by our team’s Annual Strategy Summit while personal goals are drawn out from in-depth collaborative discussions between our co-founder and the individual that centre around establishing a lifelong mission statement and self-developmental objectives  The goals of the quarterly Professional and Personal Enhancement document are to As a floral and gift destination we need to procure stock from across the globe however our focus is always on reducing our environmental footprint In order to achieve our goal of getting as close to zero-waste as possible we’ve implemented a few initiatives to promote the reuse and repurpose of materials partnered with like minded courier partners and are carefully tracking  troubleshooting new ways to limit our waste output  In  we implemented our waste tally that measures and tracks everything we dispose of and repurpose Our goal

We’re always looking for like-minded people who find purpose in service and want to leave their mark on the world Setting agreed expectations is fundamental in attracting the right talent therefore our Hiring Policy outlines the key areas of  learning and development that future team members will partake in These include We also have a unique process that ensures we have the team’s full support behind every new hire  As mentioned previously each team member is expected to actively engage in all Professional and Personal Enhancement sessions including weekly catch-ups and quarterly reviews These differ from traditional performance reviews that tend to focus solely on output and KPI results While weekly sessions are informal and focused on shorter term goal-tracking the quarterly Professional and Personal Enhancement document outlines each individual’s goals for the quarter  Professional goals are directions set forth by our team’s Annual Strategy Summit while personal goals are drawn

Collaboration & Partnerships.question: What are the mutual objectives and outcomes expected from these collaborations?
Collaboration & Partnerships.result:
Throughout the provided information, there are several instances where collaboration is mentioned or implied. These collaborations aim to achieve various mutual objectives and outcomes. Some key examples include:

1. Collaboration between Miei and its clients: Both parties work together towards a common vision of creating a more collaborative world. By working closely, they hope to achieve greater social impact and foster strong relationships based on trust and shared values.
2. Partnerships with other organizations: Miei forms partnerships with likeminded companies that share their vision for a more collaborative world. Together, they strive to achieve larger scale impact and promote a culture of giving back to the community.
3. Leadership and teamwork: Effective leadership and teamwork are emphasized as critical components for the success of any business. When leaders prioritize their teams and encourage a collaborative environment, everyone benefits from increased productivity, job satisfaction, and overall success.
4. Sharing of internal processes and documentation: By sharing their internal systems and processes, Miei hopes to contribute to the broader B Corp community and facilitate the growth of similar minded businesses. This collaboration allows for continuous improvement and learning among like-minded organizations.
5. Satisfaction guarantee policy: Miei's commitment to customer satisfaction creates a mutually beneficial outcome for both the customers and the company itself. Customers feel confident in their purchases, while Miei gains repeat business and positive reviews.
6. Heart-counts over head-counts: Emphasizing the importance of valuing individuals and their contributions, regardless of their position within the organization, promotes a collaborative and inclusive work environment.
7. Continuous improvement: Miei consistently seeks ways to improve their internal processes and systems. By doing so, they demonstrate a commitment to excellence and collaboration, which ultimately leads to better outcomes for their employees, customers, and the wider community.
